name: Vitale #22
description: Your 0.99 carat Fancy Intense Yellow-Orange diamond is rare, with only 1 in 400,000 diamonds with similar characteristics. The orange and yellow hues of your diamond attest the presence of nitrogen atoms that absorb blue light and create a yellow tint, combined with red luminescence. A flame captured in crystalline form, this unique colour is associated with warmth and vitality. A mere 4 to 7 similar diamonds enter the market yearly.
